duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide legal advice and representation in employment benefits and executive compensation matters.
Analyze and interpret employment tax regulations and implications for clients.
Draft legal documents, memoranda, and correspondence related to employment tax issues.
Collaborate with clients to address employment tax concerns and provide strategic guidance.
Stay updated on state and federal payroll reporting requirements, tax laws, and compliance procedures.
Participate in employment tax audits, appeals, and resolution processes.
Conduct research and analysis on employee retention credits and fringe benefit taxation rules.
Manage multiple priorities and deadlines related to employment tax cases.

education_certification.credential: Juris Doctor (J.D.) degree, LLM in Tax preferred
